attributes.comment:
I would like to comment on your proposal to increase rates on adoption nationally
or internationally. It is a crime that you would jeopordize the well being of a young
person by not giving them he ability to be loved and cared for the way they should
be. My daughter and son in law have spent thousands trying to have a baby and
since that can never be they have opted to adopt through China. A small infant
child that has no hope in this world will be given the opportunity to become
whatever they decide to become. There are many babies that grow up and never
have a thing or the oportunity it is very sad. Why would you want to raise fees,
that would defray other worthy parents from being able to do what they want most
in the world, have a child to care for and nurture.

Please rethink raising these fees, the government can find other ways to acquire
money, don't make the small child be one of those ways.

Thank you for your time.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Yvonne L. Shouey
